creditline: Gift of the Decorative Arts Council with proceeds from the 2002 Antiques Show and Sale
description: maroon transfer design on small plate; floral border; central design of ship, buildings, foliage and a horse-drawn cart
inscription:
Inscription, Stamp and Sticker

on bottom of rim, in maroon: [New Orleans / Lace Border / R.S. (inside a cartouche)]
markings: on bottom, center: floral-form impressed stamp; top center, on sticker: [\"New Orleands\" by / R. Stevenson, c. 1830\'s / Staffordshire / 01125 / $300.00]
object_name: Plate with scene of New Orleans
title: Plate with scene of New Orleans
